results.snippet: This bill was passed by Congress on July 3, 2025 and goes to the President next. Other activity may have occurred on another bill with identical or similar provisions. ... results.title: Breaking Down the One Big Beautiful Bill-2025-06-04
results.snippet: The House of Representatives’ Fiscal Year (FY) 2025 reconciliation bill – titled the One Big Beautiful Bill Act of 2025 (OBBBA) – would add $2.4 trillion to primary deficits over the coming decade, adding $3.0 trillion to the debt including interest.

results.title: Trump's 'Big Beautiful Bill' Clears House in Narrow Vote - Newsweek
results.snippet: House passes Trump's tax bill 218–214, slashing aid programs and extending cuts ahead of July 4 signature.
